General.Name: Lecron Energy Saving Materials
General.Description: Lecron Industrial Development Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells chemical products in China and internationally. Its products include monomer polyether polyol, combined polyether polyols, polyester polyols, polyether polyols, and urethane products. The company also provides fluorine-containing refrigerants, fluorine-containing polymers, and fluorine-containing fine chemicals. Its products are used in various applications, including building insulation, sandwich panels, water heaters, cold storage insulation, refrigerator freezers, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Lecron Internet Media Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Lecron Industrial Development Group Co., Ltd. in July 2019. Lecron Industrial Development Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Zibo, China.

1.Name: Ms. Xiu Ying  Shao
1.Title: Vice Chairman of Directors, Chief Engineer and Deputy Gen. Mang.
